thread.title: Srikanth Deva joins Twitter | Deccan Chronicle
thread.title_full: Srikanth Deva joins Twitter | Deccan Chronicle

author: Deccan
title: Srikanth Deva joins Twitter | Deccan Chronicle
text: Deccan Chronicle | ANUPAMA SUBRAMANIAN | October 17, 2015, 07.52 am Srikanth Deva Music director Srikanth Deva is the latest to make his presence felt on the online platform. The veteran composer who had shunned social networking mediums earlier, has finally taken the plunge. He has joined Twitter and ‘@thesrikanthdeva’ is his official handle. His latest tweet is his trademark line, “Jeichiruvom!! Hey fellow Twitteratis, lets conquer the day, one smile at a time :)” The prolific musician has also joined Facebook and wants to spread his cheerfulness with a ‘smile please’ theme. He has posted a picture of him with Hansika and Kamal Haasan. “I am a very social person. I interact with a lot of interesting celebrities and unknown people on a daily basis. Seems only natural to share this online where I can interact with friends, family and fans,” he remarks on joining the social networking world.
